Articles.Content:
Nope, sadly, watching the altimeter going crazy is quite funny...

The user below me already managed to crash KSP.

Yes, because either bugs, ran out of memory or too much mods.

The user below me had already went to one of Kerbin's south/north poles.

True, unfortunately, Jeb may have violently "landed" on Santa...

The user below me is secretly a duck.

False, but I am currently driving an unmanned probe there, got 20km away from KSC

The user below me wants Watch_Dogs.

False. Not into that sorta genre.

The user below me has exploded before.

Me? No... But my rather creative rocket design, however....

The user below me lacks motivation.

Yes. I tend to lose motivation to continue what I'm currently doing in KSP.

The user below me went into Jool.

True, only with probes though

The user below me does not like to sit in chairs

True, only with probes though

The user below me does not like to sit in chairs

True..I'm in one now and its rather uncomfortable. Especially since i've been in it since 8:40, and will have to remain in it till 3:00

The user below is not very fond of school

False. I enjoy engineering!

The user below is not a human.
The user below me wishesÃ¢â‚¬â€¹ they were human.

Hell no!

I'd like to be a tree though...

The user below me would like to be a tree.

**** no

The user below me has managed to destroy the KSP universe at least once in the past

I do it daily.

Folks, please recall that profanity is against the rules. We might be a little lenient in here in some ways, but don't go breaking rules as you please, thanks.

The user below will cease to exist.

Yes, a rare Kraken attack which makes every planet disappear except Kerbol.

The user below me plays Pokemon.

EDIT: Darnit, ninja'd.

NOOO- *disappears*

The user below me plays Pokemon.

Edited April 18, 2014 by Xaelath

Not realy, I never realy liked pokemon...

The user below me know the video game series called Fallout.

True, But i could never get into it

The user below me makes youtube videos

Nope... But I watch them.

The poster below me is an oceanographer.

False. I'm a gamer.

The user below me has 50+ more posts than me.

How dare you insinuate such a-- Oh. Well, yes.

The user below has fewer posts than I.

Yes, though I thank the forum kraken for that.

The user below me was lucky enough to be unaffected by the forum kraken (and had an existing account at the time).

Nope, my devotion to the kraken saved me.

The user below me know the infamous website called... 4Chan... *Thunder sound*

True. Of course I know it, and that is why I am currently in hiding with a stolen laptop, trying to post this without being caught by the Internet Police.

The user below me has not not not not not not not not not not not not played KSP before.

Truly falsely falsely true.

The user below will turn around and look over their shoulder, expecting to see an unwelcome visitor...

I just did that, saw my little brother sleeping. The visitor is nowhere to be found.

The user below me is a Kraken.
